title: Font name please
content:
Hi, could you help me find what font this is? I appreciate your help.

Sincerely,

Chris

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [thank you.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828191833/http:/typophile.com/files/thank%20you_1.jpg) | 50.36 KB |
author: Relevant Logo

comments.content:
Could be a customized Schneidler Initials:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/grouptype/schneidler-initials/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828191833/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/grouptype/schneidler-initials/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/grouptype/schneidler-initials/")

nice josev. following through on that, identifont suggests similar [Shango](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828191833/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/castletype/shango/). it has more weights and some alternate glyphs that could be helpful.

Thanks, I'm looking for the type used in "Thank You". Neither of these ones matched that. Is this is custom font by chance?

Thanks much,

Chris
Exactly what Jodie said, customized Shango to me.
